about_the_game:
Here is the Hyperun Deluxe DLC! This DLC gives you a behind-the-scenes look at the development of Hyperun. It includes the game's original soundtrack in the form of a procedural music player, as well as several playable prototypes (versions 0.0.1, 0.1.0, and 0.2.4), representing different stages of development.



We're excited to share these experiences with you, and we hope you'll enjoy them as much as we do.

Purchasing this DLC is the best way to show us your support and interest in Hyperun!

The Deluxe DLC includes:

A music player to listen to all your favorite songs from the game:




    - Over 40 procedurally generated songs
    - Two listening modes: manual and automatic
    - Smooth and intuitive interface
    - Supports multiple resolutions
    - Track length selection
    - Single-track selection for hours of listening
    - Speedometer (for changing tracks like in-game via speed changes)

Three playable historical versions of the game:


Version 0.0.1: The very first prototype of Hyperun! Originally called "Rideout."



Version 0.1.0: This version was shown at the Stunfest 2016 festival and received such a great reception that we decided to seriously develop Hyperun!



Version 0.2.4: This version features a new vehicle, boosts, new music, winding roads, and more! We had opted for a manga-style graphics at the time, which later evolved into the style you know today!



Have fun!

Here is the Hyperun Deluxe DLC! This DLC gives you a behind-the-scenes look at the development of Hyperun. It includes the game's original soundtrack in the form of a procedural music player, as well as several playable prototypes (versions 0.0.1, 0.1.0, and 0.2.4), representing different stages of development.



We're excited to share these experiences with you, and we hope you'll enjoy them as much as we do.

Purchasing this DLC is the best way to show us your support and interest in Hyperun!

The Deluxe DLC includes:

A music player to listen to all your favorite songs from the game:




    - Over 40 procedurally generated songs
    - Two listening modes: manual and automatic
    - Smooth and intuitive interface

    - Single-track selection for hours of listening
    - Speedometer (for changing tracks like in-game via speed changes)

Three playable historical versions of the game:


Version 0.0.1: The very first prototype of Hyperun! Originally called "Rideout."



Version 0.1.0: This version was shown at the Stunfest 2016 festival and received such a great reception that we decided to seriously develop Hyperun!



Version 0.2.4: This version features a new vehicle, boosts, new music, winding roads, and more! We had opted for a manga-style graphics at the time, which later evolved into the style you know today!



Have fun!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Hyperun Deluxe DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Hyperun Deluxe DLC includes the game's soundtrack in the form of a procedural music player, as well as 3 playable historical prototypes! Buying this DLC is the best way to show us your support and interest in Hyperun!
